comments: His lectures are sometimes interesting. His quizzes are IMPOSSIBLE. My number one problem is that he won\'t say what will be on the tests! For the midterm: "I may include questions from the last quizzes, I might add new ones..." Not cool. I studying blind. :(

Made us buy the book halfway through the class then only used it for two weeks. He literally read us the book in class. His assignments were vague but graded very hard. He has a nice personality but not the best professor.
Great professor. Gets off topic but which professor doesn\'t. Willing to help. You just have to want it. By far one of the most intelligent man I have ever met.

Sad to see this Prof. go down hill. When I had him in the early 90s, he class was related to Geography, Money, and Society. His class was engaging, interesting, and relevant. He is a hedonist, but very intelligent.

His Intro to World Geography class was ridiculous! He is extremely off topic throughout the entire class, and when he is on topic he\'s hard to follow. You can study all you want but you\'re never sure what you\'re supposed to be studying so it doesn\'t help. Attendance isn\'t mandatory though, and I failed every test and somehow got a B. Good luck!

This professor has a really hard time teaching. He doesn\'t ever know what time class ends, he is always late, he is boring. The class is extremely hard because it is not understandable. Don\'t recommend it

DO NOT take this professor. he is a terrible teacher and he makes it hard on purpose. i am an a+ student and on the first test i recieved a 54%. his class is impossible and stay away from it if possible.

"Globalization." He sounds like he\'s the representative of our planet talking to other galaxies when he\'s lecturing. He\'s so smart. He will talk about trips to Vegas and make it about geography. I love going to his class, anybody who doesn\'t just hates great teaching.
Wonderful professor, very open about his personality and point of view as a teacher should be. His tests are not too difficult unless you miss class which many people seem to.

this dude sucks, but he\'s awesome. all he talks about like mentioned before is beer and partying and guiness from the tap. he does not believe and god and is an old fashioned socialist. i slept 20 minutes in every class. his loanguage is funny because he pronounces words all whacky and his LAUGH IS RIDICULOUS. soudns like hes hocking a loogie.

Do not buy the textbook b/c it will not help you. I went to every class, and attendance was optional. The test was nothing about the notes or textbook. He curves the grade, but it was a stressful. I recommend switching out of this class if it is on your schedule.
he is an absolute horrible teacher. he\'d be able to turn an honor student into a fool in a matter of a few classes and tests. he honestly should not even be teaching.
tests are mostly guess and pray.he rambles a lot and wants to be accepted by students more than teach them

All this guy talks about is sex, drugs, and partying. He actually told us that he wished he could bring a keg into the classroom and have girls dance on the tables, but that since that wasn\'t appropriate in our space, he couldn\'t. He also told us that our grandparents were going to die soon- one girl in the class actually started to cry.
DO NOT TAKE THIS THIS GUY!! HES TERRIBLE, ALL HE TALKS ABOUT IS BEER, AND HE IS NOT WILLING TO WORK WITH YOU AT ALL, SAVE YOURSELF STRESS AND DO NOT TAKE HIM, HE RUINED ALOT FOR ME:(

Dr. Thomas was on probation when I had him so the most of us received B\'s when we definitely shouldnt have. He is very boring and unclear. Talks alot about sex and his ex wives. Try to get your hands on some exams from previous semesters because he uses a lot of the same questions.
He really doesn\'t seem like he wants to be there. Find someone who has already had him to help you out. His jokes are stupid but he seems to laugh at them!

This isn\'t even a geography class. He talks about sex, drugs, atheism, and sometimes history and economics. If you actually want to learn about geography get a different professor. His tests are full of random irrelevant questions and are impossible to pass. Horrible teacher

Dont take this professor if you want someone that actually cares and will help you! His test are hard and has nothing to do with what we talk about in class but, show up to class and try your best! maybe you will have a different experiences than I did.

I attended every class and took notes every day but still struggled. i was able to pull off a B cause he weighs the grades and curves tests. Do the little assingmnts they add up to 20% of your grade. notes seem to be useless. read the chapter as he jumps around through it. Most questions on test come from random stuff that youve never seen before
